purpose: A customizable checkbox component built on top of Radix UI's checkbox primitive with Tailwind CSS styling

variables.name: Checkbox
variables.purpose: A styled checkbox component that wraps Radix UI's checkbox primitive
variables.usage: Exported as the main component for use in forms and UI where checkbox input is needed

key_points: Uses Radix UI's CheckboxPrimitive for accessibility and behavior
Implements React forwardRef for ref forwarding
Uses lucide-react's Check icon for the checked indicator
Applies custom styling with Tailwind CSS classes through cn utility

patterns: Component composition pattern using Radix UI primitives
ForwardRef pattern for proper ref handling
Accessible component design with built-in keyboard and screen reader support
Separation of behavior (Radix UI) from styling (Tailwind)
issues: The component relies on specific Tailwind CSS variables (border-primary, ring-offset-background, etc.) that must be defined in the theme
No explicit TypeScript type exports for the component props
The fixed size (h-4 w-4) might not be suitable for all use cases - could benefit from size variants
